name: Thrust Vector Control
description: Study of thrust vector control mechanisms and their role in rocket propulsion.

name: Propellant Chemistry
description: Exploration of different propellant types and their chemical compositions.

name: Advanced Combustion Techniques
description: Advanced techniques for rocket engine combustion optimization.

name: Hypersonic Aerodynamics
description: In-depth study of hypersonic aerodynamic characteristics and their applications.

name: Wind Tunnel Testing
description: Principles and methods of wind tunnel testing for aerodynamic analysis.

name: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)
description: Introduction to CFD simulations and their use in aerodynamic analysis.

name: Spacecraft Thermal Control
description: Exploration of spacecraft thermal control systems and heat dissipation techniques.

name: Spacecraft Power Systems
description: Study of power generation and distribution in spacecraft systems.

name: Space Environment Effects
description: Understanding the effects of the space environment on spacecraft materials and systems.

name: Interplanetary Trajectories
description: Analysis of interplanetary trajectory calculations and mission planning.

name: Space Debris and Collision Avoidance
description: Study of space debris monitoring and collision avoidance strategies in space orbits.

name: Celestial Mechanics
description: Introduction to celestial mechanics and its role in spacecraft navigation.

name: Stellar Evolution
description: Exploration of the life cycles of stars and their evolution.

name: Galactic Structure and Dynamics
description: Study of the structure and dynamics of galaxies in the universe.

name: Exoplanets and Planetary Systems
description: Introduction to the discovery and study of exoplanets and planetary systems.

name: Satellite Communication Systems
description: Study of satellite communication systems and their applications.

name: Deep Space Communication
description: Communication challenges and solutions for deep space missions.

name: Quantum Communication in Space
description: Exploration of quantum communication technologies in space missions.

name: Planetary Geology
description: Study of the geological processes and features on planets and moons.

name: Planetary Atmospheres
description: Exploration of planetary atmospheres and their characteristics.

name: Astrobiology and the Search for Extraterrestrial Life
description: Introduction to astrobiology and the search for life beyond Earth.
